description: Surrogate primary key uniquely identifying each project record.
Business or module name of the project this localization entry belongs to.
Reference path to the source location of the project’s data (e.g., database/table/column or source-control path); used to extract strings. Likely a hierarchical locator; confirm with SME.
Enumerated code indicating the type of localized content or source (table column, view, resource, etc.). Mapping of codes to types should be confirmed with SMEs.
Logical namespace or code package used to group resources for this project, often aligning with application namespaces.
Boolean flag indicating whether the text for this project should be processed for localization/export (1) or skipped (0).
Optional SQL filter clause applied when selecting records for this project’s extraction or processing.
